characters.name: Watchman (stormtrooper)
tags: First appearance, simultaneous with Fool's Bargain

books.title: Young Jedi Knights: Heirs of the Force
books.author: Kevin J. Anderson
books.description: The novel was reprinted in the collectionsYoung Jedi Knights: The Rise of the Shadow Academy(1996) andYoung Jedi Knights: Jedi Shadow(2002).

books.title: Young Jedi Knights: Shadow Academy
books.author: Kevin J. Anderson
books.description: The novel was reprinted inYoung Jedi Knights: The Rise of the Shadow Academy(1996) andYoung Jedi Knights: Jedi Shadow(2002).

books.title: Young Jedi Knights: The Lost Ones
books.author: Kevin J. Anderson
books.description: The novel was reprinted inYoung Jedi Knights: The Rise of the Shadow Academy(1996) andYoung Jedi Knights: Jedi Shadow(2002).

books.title: Young Jedi Knights: Lightsabers
books.author: Kevin J. Anderson
books.description: The novel was reprinted inYoung Jedi Knights: The Rise of the Shadow Academy(1996) andYoung Jedi Knights: Jedi Sunrise(2003).

books.title: Young Jedi Knights: Darkest Knight
books.author: Kevin J. Anderson
books.description: The novel was reprinted inYoung Jedi Knights: The Rise of the Shadow Academy(1996) andYoung Jedi Knights: Jedi Sunrise(2003).

books.title: Young Jedi Knights: Jedi Under Siege
books.author: Kevin J. Anderson
books.description: The day of reckoning is at hand for the young Jedi Knights. The Shadow Academy—with its army of Dark Jedi and Imperial stormtroopers—has appeared in the sky over Yavin 4. And when a commando raid destroys the shield generator protecting the Jedi academy, there is only one option: to fight.

books.title: Young Jedi Knights: Shards of Alderaan
books.author: Kevin J. Anderson
books.description: When the Empire died, they were born—a new hope for the New Republic. The young twins of Han Solo and Princess Leia have taken their first steps as Jedi Knights, defeating the evil minions of the Shadow Academy. Now, with their friends Tenel Ka and Lowbacca the Wookiee, the future heroes of an already legendary saga continue their training.

books.title: Young Jedi Knights: Diversity Alliance
books.author: Kevin J. Anderson
books.description: Everyone is searching for Bornan Thul. Not only is he father to one of Jacen's and Jaina's fellow students, he holds the key to a secret coalition gaining power in the New Republic. The young Jedi Knights race across the galaxy to find him—but they may be too late. For their true enemy is about to show its treacherous face. And it will be shockingly familiar…

books.title: Young Jedi Knights: Delusions of Grandeur
books.author: Kevin J. Anderson
books.description: The novel was reprinted inYoung Jedi Knights: The Fall of the Diversity Alliance(1998).

books.title: Young Jedi Knights: Jedi Bounty
books.author: Kevin J. Anderson
books.description: The novel was reprinted inYoung Jedi Knights: The Fall of the Diversity Alliance(1998).

books.title: Young Jedi Knights: The Emperor's Plague
books.author: Kevin J. Anderson
books.description: The novel was reprinted inYoung Jedi Knights: The Fall of the Diversity Alliance(1998).

books.title: Young Jedi Knights: Return to Ord Mantell
books.author: Kevin J. Anderson

books.title: Young Jedi Knights: Trouble on Cloud City
books.author: Kevin J. Anderson
books.description: It also includes a seven-page preview of the next book in the series,Crisis at Crystal Reef, and a fourteen-page preview ofLucasfilm'sAlien Chronicles: The Golden One.

books.title: Young Jedi Knights: Crisis at Crystal Reef
books.author: Kevin J. Anderson
books.description: Anja Gallandro planned to destroy the Solo family. But now she fights an intense inner battle—against her growing spice addiction, and her growing friendship with Jacen and Jaina. She no longer knows where her loyalties lie. In desperation for spice, she steals a ship and flees the Jedi academy.

books.title: Boba Fett: A Practical Man
books.author: Karen Traviss
books.description: On the surface, it seems like just another routine contract for Boba Fett and his Mandalorian commandos, but the mystery client who hires them to start a small war is more dangerous than any of them can possibly imagine. When the Yuuzhan Vong invasion force sweeps into the galaxy, the Mandalorians find they’re on the wrong side–fighting for an alien culture that will bring about the end of their own.

books.title: The New Jedi Order: Vector Prime
books.author: R. A. Salvatore
books.description: The events of the novel are set in25 ABY, and the story introduces the villainousYuuzhan Vongand their plans ofdomination.Vector Primewas also notable for depicting thedeathofChewbacca, which was the first time a majorStar Warsoriginal trilogycharacter was permanently killed in the Expanded Universe.

books.title: The New Jedi Order: Dark Tide I: Onslaught
books.author: Michael A. Stackpole
books.description: It is a perilous time for the New Republic. Just when unity is needed most, mistrust is on the rise. Even the Jedi feel the strain, as rogue elements rebel against Luke Skywalker's leadership. When alien invaders known as the Yuuzhan Vong strike without warning, the New Republic is thrown on the defensive.

books.title: The New Jedi Order: Dark Tide II: Ruin
books.author: Michael A. Stackpole
books.description: New York Timesbestselling author Michael A. Stackpole continuesThe New Jedi Orderepic withDARK TIDE II: RUIN, a thrillingStar Warsadventure in which the Jedi Knights must fight their most treacherous battle—against an unrelenting evil intent on devouring the galaxy…

books.title: The New Jedi Order: Agents of Chaos I: Hero's Trial
books.author: James Luceno
books.description: Merciless attacks by invincible alien force have left the New Republic reeling. Dozens of worlds have succumbed to occupation or annihilation, and even the Jedi Knights have tasted defeat. In these darkest of times, the noble Chewbacca is laid to rest, having died as heroically as he lived—and a grief-stricken Han Solo is left to fit the pieces of his shattered life back together before he loses everything: friends, family, and faith.

books.title: The New Jedi Order: Agents of Chaos II: Jedi Eclipse
books.author: James Luceno
books.description: A string of smashing victories by the forces of the sinister aliens known as the Yuuzhan Vong has left New Republic resources and morale stretched to the breaking point. Leia Organa Solo, estranged from her husband, Han, oversees the evacuation of refugees on planets in the path of the merciless invaders. Luke Skywalker struggles to hold the fractious Jedi Knights together, even while one of them undertakes a bold but reckless undercover mission.

books.title: The New Jedi Order: Balance Point
books.author: Kathy Tyers
books.description: In the aftermath of one tragedy, will a youngJedi'ssearch for redemption lead to yet another?

books.title: The New Jedi Order: Recovery
books.author: Troy Denning
books.description: As the forces of darkness threaten to engulf the galaxy, one last defiant spark remains…. Though the Yuuzhan Vong were victorious in their savage conquest of the planet Duro, they failed to extract sensitive information from Leia Organa Solo, who now barely clings to life after enduring the enemies' torture. Unless she receives medical attention soon, the badly wounded Princess and former head of the New Republic will surely die. Pursued by bounty hunters, Han Solo begins a race against time, only to find his urgent pleas for help rejected by planet after planet, as the Jedi are blamed for the continuing fight against the seemingly invincible aliens. Desperate, the Solos decide on a suicide mission. They must reach Coruscant, the New Republic's strife-ridden capital where traitors, appeasers, and assassins now share the same goal as the fierce Yuuzhan Vong: kill all Jedi….

books.title: The New Jedi Order: Edge of Victory I: Conquest
books.author: Greg Keyes
books.description: The dazzlingStar Warsspace adventure The New Jedi Order continues as Luke Skywalker, Anakin Solo, Mara Jade Skywalker, and others battle their deadliest enemy in a tale of nonstop action, shadowy evil, and spectacular triumph…

books.title: The New Jedi Order: Edge of Victory II: Rebirth
books.author: Greg Keyes
books.description: The brutal Yuuzhan Vong are scouring the universe for Jedi to slaughter. With no help from the divided New Republic, the Jedi stand alone against their seemingly invincible foe. Han Solo and Leia Organa Solo risk deadly consequences with their controversial tactics to bolster the Jedi resistance. After uncovering a new Yuuzhan Vong menace, Anakin and Tahiri find themselves wanted for murder by the Peace Brigade. To avoid capture, they jump into hyperspace… and into trouble far graver.

books.title: The New Jedi Order: Star by Star
books.author: Troy Denning
books.description: The New Jedi Order: Star by Staris aStar WarsLegendsnovel written byTroy Denning. It is the ninth volume in the seriesStar Wars: The New Jedi Order, and it was first published onOctober 30,2001byDel Rey.

books.title: The New Jedi Order: Dark Journey
books.author: Elaine Cunningham
books.description: The New Jedi Order continues as Jaina Solo struggles with anger and despair after the Jedi Knights' harrowing adventure behind enemy lines.

books.title: The New Jedi Order: Enemy Lines I: Rebel Dream
books.author: Aaron Allston
books.description: The book tells of theNew Republicresponse, led byWedge Antilles, to theYuuzhan Vong'scaptureof the galactic capital ofCoruscant. Old friends and heroes of the New Republic, includingLuke Skywalker,HanandLeia Solo,Lando Calrissian,Wedge Antilles, as well asJaina Solo, are brought together in a seemingly impossible defense ofBorleiasagainst overwhelming forces.

books.title: The New Jedi Order: Enemy Lines II: Rebel Stand
books.author: Aaron Allston
books.description: Not since Emperor Palpatine have the Jedi battled such monstrous evil. Unless they succeed against staggering odds, the galaxy is doomed.

books.title: The New Jedi Order: Traitor
books.author: Matthew Stover
books.description: The New Jedi Order: Traitoris aStar WarsLegendsnovel and the thirteenth volume in theStar Wars: The New Jedi Orderseries. It was written byMatthew Stoverand published byDel Reyin paperback onJuly 30,2002. TheScience Fiction Book Clubreleased an exclusive hardcover edition that same year.

books.title: The New Jedi Order: Destiny's Way
books.author: Walter Jon Williams
books.description: The time of reckoning is close at hand. Events in theNew York TimesbestsellingStar WarsThe New Jedi Order series take a decisive turn, as the heroes of the New Republic prepare for their most volatile clash yet with the enemy—from without and from within.

books.title: The New Jedi Order: Ylesia
books.author: Walter Jon Williams
books.description: Due to an oversight byLucasBooksandDel Reythat left many readers expecting the story to be included within the mass market paperback edition ofDestiny's Way,Ylesiawas offered as a free download onStarWars.comonAugust 26,2003.[3]

books.title: The New Jedi Order: Force Heretic I: Remnant
books.author: Sean Williams
books.description: As the bloodied and weary galaxy faces battle once more, the Jedi take on the formidable task of bringing the last of the Empire into the light….

books.title: The New Jedi Order: Force Heretic II: Refugee
books.author: Sean Williams
books.description: Swift and deadly, the Yuuzhan Vong have blasted their way across the galaxy—and now stand on the threshold of total victory. Yet a courageous few still dare to oppose them…

books.title: The New Jedi Order: Force Heretic III: Reunion
books.author: Sean Williams
books.description: The Jedi move one step closer to saving the embattled galaxy—only to confront a formidable wall of resistance…

books.title: The New Jedi Order: The Final Prophecy
books.author: Greg Keyes
books.description: As a beleaguered galaxy fights its way back from the brink of destruction, the Jedi's most fearsome enemy plots to end the war—and claim victory—with a final act of domination….

books.title: The New Jedi Order: The Unifying Force
books.author: James Luceno
books.description: The hardcover edition ofThe Unifying Forceincluded an exclusive CD-ROM featuring a digital edition ofVector Prime, aNew Jedi Ordertimeline, and aroundtable discussionfrom the series' creators.

books.title: Dark Nest I: The Joiner King
books.author: Troy Denning
books.description: The novel is set in35 ABY, severalyearsafter the end of theYuuzhan Vong War, and it introduces the titularDark Nest Crisis.

books.title: Dark Nest II: The Unseen Queen
books.author: Troy Denning
books.description: The book also contains a preview of theOutbound Flightnovel.

books.title: Dark Nest III: The Swarm War
books.author: Troy Denning
books.description: In the explosive conclusion to the Dark Nest trilogy, Luke Skywalker summons the heroes of the New Jedi Order from near and far as the Star Wars galaxy teeters on the edge of eternal war. Yet even the combined powers of the formidable Jedi may not be enough to vanquish the deadly perils confronting them.

books.title: Legacy of the Force: Betrayal
books.author: Aaron Allston
books.description: A dark enemy stalks Luke Skywalker and the Jedi.

books.title: Legacy of the Force: Bloodlines
books.author: Karen Traviss
books.description: A new era of exciting adventures and shocking revelations continues to unfold, as the legendaryStar Warssaga sweeps forward into astonishing new territory.

books.title: Legacy of the Force: Tempest
books.author: Troy Denning
books.description: Forty years after the Battle of Yavin a dangerous new era in the Star Wars epic begins–the revelations are shocking, the stakes desperate, and the enemy everywhere.

books.title: Legacy of the Force: Exile
books.author: Aaron Allston
books.description: According toSue Rostoni, the last day ofExileis Day 106 in the series, or day 228 in to year 40 ABY, or75:7:15. The audio version was narrated byMarc Thompson. The cover featuresHan Soloand his wife,Leia Organa Solo.

books.title: Legacy of the Force: Sacrifice
books.author: Karen Traviss
books.description: To bring peace and order to a galaxy at war, Jacen Solo will sacrifice anything—or anyone. Now the moment of choice is at hand.

books.title: Legacy of the Force: Inferno
books.author: Troy Denning
books.description: Luke Skywalker wanted to unify the Jedi Order and bring peace to the universe. Instead, his wife, Mara, lies dead at the hands of an unknown assassin, his wayward nephew Jacen has seized control of the Galactic Alliance, and the galaxy has exploded in all-out civil war.

books.title: Legacy of the Force: Fury
books.author: Aaron Allston
books.description: Fighting alongside the Corellian rebels, Han and Leia are locked in a war against their son Jacen, who grows more powerful and more dangerous with each passing day. Nothing can stop Jacen's determination to bring peace with a glorious Galactic Alliance victory–whatever the price.

books.title: Legacy of the Force: Revelation
books.author: Karen Traviss
books.description: During this savage civil war, all efforts to end Jacen Solo's tyranny of the Galactic Alliance have failed. Now, with Jacen approaching the height of his dark powers, no one–not even the Solos and the Skywalkers–knows if anything can stop the Sith Lord before his plan to save the galaxy ends up destroying it.

books.title: Legacy of the Force: Invincible
books.author: Troy Denning
books.description: No war can last forever. Now, in the long and punishing battle between the defiant champions of the New Jedi Order and the juggernaut that is the Galactic Alliance, the endgame is finally at hand. With so much lost—and nothing less than the course of the future still at stake—there can be no turning back. No matter the consequences.

books.title: Crosscurrent
books.author: Paul S. Kemp
books.description: An ancient Sith ship hurtles into the future carrying a lethal cargo that could forever destroy Luke Skywalker's hopes for peace.

books.title: Riptide (novel)
books.author: Paul S. Kemp
books.description: When a ship full of Sith warriors arrived in Galactic Alliance space, the fight to destroy it accidentally uncovered a deadly menace: a long-hidden group of clones, secretly created as insidious weapons capable of wielding the Force and heedless of the differences between light side and dark side. Now the clones have escaped -- and evidence suggests they are flawed by genetic disease and violent madness.

books.title: Millennium Falcon (novel)
books.author: James Luceno
books.timeline_raw: 60 BBY(In flashback(s))[3]19 BBY(In flashback(s))[3]10 BBY(In flashback(s))[3]5 BBY(In flashback(s))[3]43 ABY[3]
books.description: Climb aboard, buckle up, and prepare to jump to hyperspace for the ultimate flight of the ship that launched a thousand fates.

books.title: Fate of the Jedi: Outcast
books.author: Aaron Allston
books.description: Fate of the Jedi: Outcastis a novel byAaron Allstonreleased onMarch 24,2009. It is the first novel in theFate of the Jediseries and published as a hardcover[6]and audiobook. The book features an excerpt of the subsequent novelFate of the Jedi: Omen. The audiobook is narrated byMarc Thompson, who narrated the audiobook versions for theStar Wars: Legacy of the Forceseries. The paperback was released onApril 27,2010.

books.title: Fate of the Jedi: Omen
books.author: Christie Golden
books.description: The Galactic Alliance is reeling from civil war. The Jedi are at risk. And the Sith are on the rise....

books.title: Fate of the Jedi: Abyss
books.author: Troy Denning
books.description: Peace is the way of the Jedi. But with deadly enemies on every side, war may be the only way out.

books.title: Fate of the Jedi: Backlash
books.author: Aaron Allston
books.description: Locked in a war of wills and weapons, the Jedi Order and the Galactic Alliance must come to terms—before the Sith's army of darkness enacts revenge.

books.title: Fate of the Jedi: Allies
books.author: Christie Golden
books.description: Only one thing could unite the forces of the Jedi and the Sith: an enemy far vaster—and deadlier—than both.

books.title: Fate of the Jedi: Vortex
books.author: Troy Denning
books.description: Jedi and Sith fight side by side against an even greater foe. But how long can enemies remain allies? And how high is the price of betrayal?

books.title: Fate of the Jedi: Conviction
books.author: Aaron Allston
books.description: The Jedi have struck a blow against the heart of tyranny. Can Luke Skywalker strike down the embodiment of evil?

books.title: Fate of the Jedi: Ascension
books.author: Christie Golden
books.description: How long can the Jedi remain in power? How far will the Sith go to rule supreme? What chance do both stand against Abeloth?

books.title: Fate of the Jedi: Apocalypse
books.author: Troy Denning
books.description: There can be no surrender.There will be no mercy.It's not just the future of the galaxy at stake—It's the destiny of the Force.

books.title: X-Wing: Mercy Kill
books.author: Aaron Allston
books.timeline_raw: 13 ABY(In flashback(s))[4]19 ABY(In flashback(s))[4]29 ABY(In flashback(s))[4]44 ABY[4]
books.description: The X-wing aces of Wraith Squadron soar back into action, on a full-throttle mission to match wits and weapons with an Imperial General gone rogue.

books.title: Crucible (novel)
books.author: Troy Denning
books.description: Han Solo, Luke Skywalker, and Princess Leia have spent a lifetime fighting wars, bringing the Jedi back from extinction, raising families, and saving the galaxy more times than they can count. They've earned the right to rest on their laurels and let the younger generation shoulder the burden--but fate has another adventure in store for our heroes, a quest only they can tackle and hope to survive...
